hmmm[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 12:17:31 PM[/size][hr]

i think theres 2 spaces and need to be one like else if (itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1623) {
theres 2 spaces were 1755__&& and … change it to one space?

Spaces are mostly ignored by programming languages - you don’t need them.
[/quote]
Mabey He entered code rong…[/quote]

READ?[quote=“zubmage, post:6, topic:190285”]Its alright, thanks for helping. I fixed it.[/quote]

item.title: Can't see anything wrong with this :S
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

This is my code for crafting:

else if (itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1623) { if (playerLevel[12] >= 15) { deleteItem(1623, getItemSlot(1623), 1); addItem(1605, 1); addSkillXP(363, 12); startAnimation(885); } else { sendMessage( "You need a crafting level of 15 to do this.");

I want the animation (855) to work, but it doesn’t do the animation when I use ID 1755 on ID 1623. The actual crafting bit works.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't see anything wrong with this :S
